item.title: Thanksgiving Turkey
item.description: Thanksgiving Turkey This recipe should be started a few days before to allow turkey time to defrost. All Ingredients Turkey.............. 1 Garlic.............. 1 Head White onion......... 1 Chopped carrots..... 1 Chopped celery...... 1 Turkey stock........ 2 quarts Melted Butter....... 1 cup Baking powder....... 1 tsp Lemon............... 1 Sage................ To Taste Rosemary............ To Taste Thyme............... To Taste Salt................ To Taste Pepper.............. To Taste Cookware Pan Meat injector Tin foil String Roasting base Garlic.
